lines.text: How does a week in the hole sound?
A week, is that the best you got? I was once in a hole for 3000 years, this should be a breeze.
That's my order. My wish, is to slow dance with you, for one minute, Compton style!
What do you want?
Your soul.
[pause]
And a pack of cigarettes.
Hey Wishmaster, you some kinda Wishmaster or sumthin'?
Welcome to my world, Morgana.
Where's Gregory?
Where's he's always wanted to be. Behold the man.
[points to crucified Gregory]
What good is your faith now?
[Looking around his personal Hell dimension]
All right. I understand. You've had a tough day. I can see how this could get a little depressing in here, couldn't it? This place isn't exactly happy.
You won't succeed.
Who's going to stop me?
God will stop you.
God has nothing to do with this.
God has everything to do with this. Be gone, Satan!
I think you have your demons mixed up, Father.
You want to break heads? I can break heads.
Everybody needs help... even the devil.
What the hell kind of devil are you?
I claim that which is owed.
Evil never dies.
